name: The Final Spell
description:
The Final Spell is the Final Bachelor's Degree Project of Cristian and David, the creators of Vivaio.

Is a small demo that includes:

  • Valley of Immortality zone
  • 2 unique songs by Manel Espinosa (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpMVwh7whDtwykEyoFdkHGg)
  • 3 spells
  • 3 enemies
  • 2 achievements
  • 1 main quest and 1 secondary quest
  • Dozens of NPCs

We have no intention to develop it further, but we're open to suggestions!
